name: Wowza Inc.
description:
Wowza is a Minneapolis-based creative boutique with special expertise in user interface design and strategy for data-driven websites, mobile apps, dash boards and data portals. In addition, Wowza also owns QuarterTon Productions, an award-winning video content and production company that produces strategic marketing, training and documentary videos for clients in a wide range of industries and agencies including retail, healthcare, higher education and manufacturing.
Founded in 2003 by Jeff Rabkin and Susan Scofield, Wowza is a leading expert in the area of public reporting of healthcare quality data and serves clients nationwide. For more information about Wowza, please visit www.wowzamade.com. For more information about QuarterTon, please visit www.quartertonproductions.com.
